lang=js
.
```js
const foo = (bar) => {
    console.log(bar)
}
```
.
<pre class="language-js"><code class="language-js"><span class="token keyword">const</span> foo <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>bar<span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">=></span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>bar<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
.

lang=unknown
.
```unknown-languge
const foo = (bar) => {
    console.log(bar)
}
```
.
<pre class="language-text"><code class="language-text">const foo = (bar) =&gt; {
    console.log(bar)
}
</code></pre>
.

lang=undefined
.
```
const foo = (bar) => {
    console.log(bar)
}
```
.
<pre class="language-text"><code class="language-text">const foo = (bar) =&gt; {
    console.log(bar)
}
</code></pre>
.

indent
.
    const foo = (bar) => {
        console.log(bar)
    }
.
<pre><code>const foo = (bar) =&gt; {
    console.log(bar)
}
</code></pre>
.

coverage

clean up init (constructor)
remove icon
